page.title: 12Houghton-Social Survey
page.content: Number of people questioned:MALES 21, FEMALES 35; Ages :UNDER 20-9,20/40-17, 40/60-18, OVER 60-12 :Always lived in Houghton :YES-24,NO-32 ;Employed :YES-27 ,NO-29 ;Unemployed-9 ; Housewife-8 ;Pensioner-12 ;Houghton as a pleasent place to live :YES-40,NO-16 ; Could be made better by: Less Litter-14; Better bus service-12 ;a cinema-21; Better police-11; More for young people-23; Bigger & better shops-11;Less pubs-8 Swimming pool-19; A vet-2;More family activities-9 Adequate shopping-YES-33,NO-23 Use of local amenities; Library-36 ; Park-33 ;Bingo-9; Sports Centre-22 ; YMCA-8
